Articles.Content:
I quickly move the hillbillies away before [@munlander1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/168560-munlander1/) can exact his vengeance upon them.

I then call upon the Federation ([@DarkOwl57](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/161624-darkowl57/), [@ThaZeus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/148344-thazeus/), [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/)) to drive out [@munlander1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/168560-munlander1/) and liberate the hillbillies.

Federation's hill. I ask to join the Federation.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-07T21:09:14Z" title="03/07/2017 09:09  PM" data-short="7 yr">March 7, 2017</time> by greenTurtle1134**
  
Correct @ reference

My comedy show prospers and countinues.

...

\*insert bad joke here\*

> 
> 
> 32 minutes ago, Spacetraindriver said:
> 
> 
> \*insert bad joke here\*
> 

"What do you call pregnant?"

...

"A 747 Dreamlifter!"

My rescued comedy show
I fire you. My much better establishment.

I quit so you can't fire me and you feel bad.

Your hurt feelings.

I play some ksp and feel all better.

My good feeling.

Oops, the file was corrupted.

Your corrupted file.
I redownload ksp. My fresh, new copy.

I put on parental controls so you guys will stop bickering over the computer and do your Homework!

Your less free KSP
That was a virtual machine. But yes, I do need to get my homework done. When I get my German done, off to bed for me.
Ich spreche Deutsche, was lernst du?
You have awaken cobolds. Their hill.

i sneak up, plant a bloontonium bomb, and run away

my demolished hill

I sealand it...Again

My anti aircraft platform.

I destroy it with my TBD Avenger and head back to the Enterprise.

My aircraft carrier.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-08T14:41:10Z" title="03/08/2017 02:41  PM" data-short="7 yr">March 8, 2017</time> by Spacetraindriver**

I assist the nation that called me. The other members of the Federation didn't come, but we still win.

My great armed forces
Kinda late mate, only your navy is left.

You're wrong. You destroyed your own Navy instead

My Navy

Blue humanoids riding coloured pterodactyls arrive to the hill and throw out your Navy.

Na'vi hill.

Ah but you forgot the fact that my Navy all has AAA guns! Your pterodactyls were shredded to bits.

Mine and [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/)'s planet

I take a moon while none of you are looking

my moon

Planet is out of resources and you cannot live there anymore

But i were building weaponized colony on the Moon

My and [@Mr. Me](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/29791-mr-me/)'s moon

flying brains destroy the moon after absorbing all of the knowledge, the brain's hill

OH NO THEY'RE HEADED TO EARTH!!!

yep then they are heading somewhere else ^^  

because a hill without king
I take the hill before they get there.
